name: my_starter_kit
//: If you want you can run scripts_  Scripts are what Joe was using in his starter kits whenever he said something like npm run watch_  Scripts make your life easier_

scripts.//: You could do something like yarn or npm run watch by using the property watch and then in the string put in the shell command which is gulp_  For watch we use gulp because that is the default command and it runs everything_

You could do something like yarn or npm run production by using the property production and then in the string put in the shell command which is gulp production_  For production we use gulp production because that is the command for making a production build
You could add the test property if you are using a library like mocha or jest or whatever you decide to use_  You could change the value to jest, instead of what is there now_

author: Luis Rodriguez
